album.title: One Love: The Very Best Of...

track.name: Buffalo Soldier
comments: love what he is saying in this song, well put together words
The Great Bob Marley, love this track!
One of my favorites, by Bob.  But to see him perform this live is A-Mazing!!!!!!!!!! <3
OYE YOY YO....OYE YOY YOY YO...OYE YOY YOY YOY YOY YOY YOY YO!!!!! [2]

So, I work in a hospital as real estate property manager secretary .. and a women just came up to my desk (big time biatch from the south) and this song came on while she was trying to talk to me -i might as well have sparked a blunt infront of her- hah! good times. :)
MUST WE ALL NEVE FORGETT TO  SHARE THE LOVE FOR ANY GREAT MUSICIAN  SUCH AS THE MAN BOB. NEVER FORGET THE HAPPIES AND BAD DAYS AND THE PAST TIME GETTING THROUGHT IT ALL WITH A LITTLE LISTENING
Happy Birthday, Robert Nesta Marley. RIP
OYE YOY YO....OYE YOY YOY YO...OYE YOY YOY YOY YOY YOY YOY YO!!!!!
one of the best bob marley live performances...
